title: Hey, I have put 3 choices for counselling, 1) aiml,ece and cs I'm interested in ece at RR campus, but I have put first preference as aiml, would I be able to select ece at counseling even if I get aiml ?
content:
Title :

Also,what is the thing up with creating bank account with University, which bank company is it?

comments.body: preference kaha par bharna bharna hai ??
Bank account is with union bank of india, scholarship money and such gets deposited there.
What if I don't have a pan card
use your parentsâ€™ card as mentioned in the photo
